game_description: ----THIS PRODUCT IS FOR ENDUSER ONLY (under EULA licence) FOR INSTITUTIONAL ACCESS FEEL FREE TO CONTACT US: info@medicinevirtual.com ----- Do you know how many bones are in the human body? Get to know the human anatomy in an enjoyable way thanks to the High School Anatomy. The High School Anatomy is an educational application in VR that offers unique virtual and educational experience thanks to all advantages of virtual reality in order to make learning more entertaining and effective. Explore your body to the smallest details with precisely modelled anatomical structures. Amazing graphics and intuitive control allows you to explore the human anatomy from a whole new perspective. A unique function – AntMode ®– makes you 40 times smaller in order to explore the inner body structures in a greater detail. The High School Anatomy contains all anatomy systems and a number of amazing functions.
review_1: A lot of features are incomplete. They will suddenly not show structures or the controllers won’t pick up the structures. I experienced this a lot with the puzzle tool. If it’s not fixed I will return the application.
review_2: Using it for anatomy and okay, it is not much complicated but for simplier stuff is great!
review_3: Great anatomic detail and fun interface. Some instructor lead interactive education would be an excellent addition.
review_4: And what is the Institution button?
